pages.text: To craft almost anything in this mod, you'll need an $(item)Elemental Combinator!$() $(br2)In short, it's a unusual crafting block$(br2)But in order to craft it, $(item)Elemental Shards$() are required$(br2)This is a magic ore that can absorb the elements and contain them
You can find them in caves under Y:40, you will need a stone pickaxe or better. $(br2) Once you have found the $(item)Elemental Shards$(), you can proceed to the next step
The next step is crafting!$(br)This is a recipe of $(item)Elemental Combinator$(). It's pretty easy to craft. $(2br) Once you've crafted it, you are ready to go!
